main event: On 13 August 1954, observers in Greenbelt, Maryland saw 4-5 objects flying in a V formation.
interesting points: The objects moved silently and appeared like normal aircraft with no visible aerodynamic features., The observation lasted between 10 to 12 minutes., The weather was clear, and visibility was good at the time of the sighting., The objects were described as circular in shape and white or silvery in color., The sighting occurred approximately 7 miles from District Heights, Maryland.
sighted object: four to five circular objects in a V formation
